game.name: TS Marketplace: U34CH Early Years Livery Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Step back in time to the origins of the distinctive, burly, and powerful U34CH diesel that toted commuters for more than two decades, with the Early Years livery pack!
